title: Beautiful downtown skyline views.
posting_body: Text 5525A to my cell for more info!
When it comes to luxury apartments and amenities, Flats rises above other communities in downtown Austin.
Each apartment was designed with your lifestyle and Austin’s unique spirit in mind.
Open floor plans showcase kitchen islands, soaking tubs and full-size washers and dryers.
Quartz countertops, track and pendant lighting and stainless steel appliances give your kitchen a sophisticated look and feel.
Depending on your personal style and unique needs, consider choosing a home with a wood accent wall, a private balcony/patio or a pet yard.
Across the community grounds, you’ll find relaxing and convenient amenities, too.
For all of your work-from-home needs, head over to the lounge and business center.
When you want to unwind, soak up the sun by the pool or spend time in the beautiful courtyard where you can grab your spatula and get grilling.
As a pet-friendly community, Gibson Flats also has a Pet Waste Reduction Program in addition to an on-site recycling center.
A bicycle storage area and EV-charging stations help enhance an eco-friendly lifestyle.
To round out your experience, on-site management and maintenance services are available for support.
Schedule your tour of these South Lamar Apartments in Austin by reaching out to the leasing office today.
